author: sproul
content: There was a bug in Lighthouse's light client server in v7.0.0-beta.0 that caused us to send and propagate invalid `LightClientFinalityUpdate`s. We will fix prior to mainnet release. Also looking into some verification failures for optimistic updates received from Lodestar and Nimbus. Let me know if you see anything amiss.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: For pending txs and nonces to work corectly, the load balancer needs a fair amount of intelligence in it, to e.g. route `eth_getTxCount(addr, "pending")` and `eth_sendRawTransaction` to the same node.  e.g. it can decode the incoming tx and recover the sender then route all pending requests wrt that sender to the same node.
